import React from 'react' import products from '../products' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' const Productscreen = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price : ${product.price} Description : {product.description} ) } export default Productscreen
